events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your resume carefully and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for software development roles, reflecting your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you throughout the hiring process for the engineering team.
Our recruiter conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, career goals, and familiarity with relevant software engineering technologies.
You responded positively to the screening and expressed strong interest in proceeding with technical interviews for the software engineering position.
We have scheduled your technical interview with the engineering panel on April 10th, focusing on coding skills, system design, and problem-solving.
You completed the technical interview with the engineering team. The panel was impressed by your knowledge and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and to address any questions you may have.
The HR interview was completed successfully. You demonstrated strong alignment with company values and enthusiasm for the engineering role.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join our engineering team and contribute your skills.
You formally accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer role, and we are excited to welcome you aboard our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has begun with the engineering team, including orientations, setup of development environments, and team introductions.
The hiring process is officially closed with your successful onboarding completed. Welcome to our engineering team and best wishes for your new role.
